Screenwriter: Pierre Salvadori, Benoît Graffin, Benjamin Charbit
Production Co: CN6 Productions, Les Films Pelléas, Chaocorp, Tovo Films, France 2 Cinéma
Synopsis: While a French Riviera police officer discovers her late husband led a criminal double life, the man who was imprisoned for her husband's crimes is released from jail and must adapt to the outside world.
Title: The Trouble With You
